issue.title: OptiTrack tutorial: update sphere marker images

content.raw:
I know this issue is from a while back, but can you clarify what this issue means? Is it the discrepancy between the marker placement in these two images?

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/default/haptix_optitrack/files/monitor.png

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/default/haptix_optitrack/files/arm_alignment.png
